verses.verse: I <S%G3870>urge<s%> you <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> by the <S%G3628>mercies<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> to <S%G3936>present<s%> your <S%G4983>bodies<s%> a <S%G2198>living<s%> and <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifice,<s%> <S%G2101>acceptable<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%> [which is] your <S%G3050>spiritual<s%> <S%G2999>service<s%> of <S%G2999>worship.<s%>

And do not be <S%G4964>conformed<s%> to <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G165>world,<s%> but be <S%G3339>transformed<s%> by the <S%G342>renewing<s%> of your <S%G3563>mind,<s%> that you may <S%G1381>prove<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> is, that <S%G18>which<s%> is <S%G18>good<s%> and <S%G2101>acceptable<s%> and <S%G5046>perfect.<s%>

For <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G1325>given<s%> to me I <S%G3004>say<s%> to <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G3956>man<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you not to <S%G5252>think<s%> <S%G5252>more<s%> <S%G5252>highly<s%> of himself <S%G3844>than<s%> he <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G5426>think;<s%> but to <S%G5426>think<s%> <S%G1519>so<s%> as to <S%G4993>have<s%> <S%G4993>sound<s%> <S%G4993>judgment,<s%> as <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G3307>allotted<s%> to <S%G1538>each<s%> a <S%G3358>measure<s%> of <S%G4102>faith.<s%>

For <S%G2509>just<s%> as we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3196>members<s%> in <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3196>members<s%> do not <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4234>function,<s%>

<S%G3779>so<s%> we, who are <S%G4183>many,<s%> are <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and <S%G2596>individually<s%> <S%G1520><s%> <S%G3196>members<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G240>another.<s%>

And since we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5486>gifts<s%> that <S%G1313>differ<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G1325>given<s%> to us, [let each exercise them accordingly]: <S%G1535>if<s%> <S%G4394>prophecy,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G356>proportion<s%> of his <S%G4102>faith;<s%>
<S%G1535>if<s%> <S%G1248>service,<s%> in his <S%G1248>serving;<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> he who <S%G1321>teaches,<s%> in his <S%G1319>teaching;<s%>

<S%G1535>or<s%> he who <S%G3870>exhorts,<s%> in his <S%G3874>exhortation;<s%> he who <S%G3330>gives,<s%> with <S%G572>liberality;<s%> he who <S%G4291>leads,<s%> with <S%G4710>diligence;<s%> he who <S%G1653>shows<s%> <S%G1653>mercy,<s%> with <S%G2432>cheerfulness.<s%>
Let <S%G26>love<s%> be <S%G505>without<s%> <S%G505>hypocrisy.<s%> <S%G655>Abhor<s%> <S%G4190>what<s%> is <S%G4190>evil;<s%> <S%G2853>cling<s%> to <S%G18>what<s%> is <S%G18>good.<s%>

Be <S%G5387>devoted<s%> to <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another<s%> in <S%G5360>brotherly<s%> <S%G5360>love;<s%> <S%G4285>give<s%> <S%G4285>preference<s%> to <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another<s%> in <S%G5092>honor;<s%>
not <S%G3636>lagging<s%> <S%G3636>behind<s%> in <S%G4710>diligence,<s%> <S%G2204>fervent<s%> in <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> <S%G1398>serving<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%>
<S%G5463>rejoicing<s%> in <S%G1680>hope,<s%> <S%G5278>persevering<s%> in <S%G2347>tribulation,<s%> <S%G4342>devoted<s%> to <S%G4335>prayer,<s%>
<S%G2841>contributing<s%> to the <S%G5532>needs<s%> of the <S%G40>saints,<s%> <S%G1377>practicing<s%> <S%G5381>hospitality.<s%>
<S%G2127>Bless<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G1377>persecute<s%> you; <S%G2127>bless<s%> and <S%G2672>curse<s%> not.
<S%G5463>Rejoice<s%> with those who <S%G5463>rejoice,<s%> and <S%G2799>weep<s%> with those who <S%G2799>weep.<s%>

Be of the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G5426>mind<s%> <S%G1519>toward<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another;<s%> do not be <S%G5308>haughty<s%> in <S%G5426>mind,<s%> but <S%G4879>associate<s%> with the <S%G5011>lowly.<s%> Do not be <S%G5429>wise<s%> in your <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G1438>estimation.<s%>

<S%G3367>Never<s%> <S%G591>pay<s%> <S%G591>back<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> for <S%G2556>evil<s%> to <S%G3367>anyone.<s%> <S%G4306>Respect<s%> <S%G2570>what<s%> is <S%G2570>right<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men.<s%>
<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G1415>possible,<s%> so <S%G3588>far<s%> as it <S%G1537>depends<s%> on you, be at <S%G1514>peace<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men.<s%>

<S%G3361>Never<s%> <S%G1556>take<s%> your <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G1556>revenge,<s%> <S%G27>beloved,<s%> but <S%G1325>leave<s%> <S%G5117>room<s%> for the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> [of God,] for it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G1557>"Vengeance<s%> is <S%G1699>Mine,<s%> I will <S%G467>repay,<s%>" <S%G3004>says<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

"But <S%G1437>if<s%> your <S%G2190>enemy<s%> is <S%G3983>hungry,<s%> <S%G5595>feed<s%> him, and <S%G1437>if<s%> he is <S%G1372>thirsty,<s%> <S%G4222>give<s%> him a <S%G4222>drink;<s%> for in <S%G3778>so<s%> <S%G4160>doing<s%> you will <S%G4987>heap<s%> <S%G4442>burning<s%> <S%G440>coals<s%> upon his <S%G2776>head.<s%>"
Do not be <S%G3528>overcome<s%> by <S%G2556>evil,<s%> but <S%G3528>overcome<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> with <S%G18>good.<s%>
